data.text:
Nnya~……huh? Fuwaaa~ah…… 
Ah~ not good……I fell asleep~……
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>Nnya~……huh? Fuwaaa~ah…… 
<story>Ah~ not good……I fell asleep~……

data.text:
Geez, you finally woke up. ……Here, I made you 
some hot cocoa. Drink it carefully, okay? It's 
gotten really cold right now, hasn't it?
data.name: Cesario
data.processed:
<story>Geez, you finally woke up. ……Here, I made you 
<story>some hot cocoa. Drink it carefully, okay? It's 
<story>gotten really cold right now, hasn't it?

data.text:
Waa-! Ehehe, as expected of Cesario…… 
Thanks, I'll take it.
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>Waa-! Ehehe, as expected of Cesario…… 
<story>Thanks, I'll take it.

data.text: Haa, that really warmed me up~……
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed: <story>Haa, that really warmed me up~……

data.text:
I'm glad. ……And so, were you able to enjoy 
your first sunbathing session of the year?
data.name: Cesario
data.processed:
<story>I'm glad. ……And so, were you able to enjoy 
<story>your first sunbathing session of the year?

data.text:
Yeah, it was great♪ The once per year luxury of 
basking in the sun, taking a nap during the first 
sunrise……together with some of Cesario's cocoa!
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>Yeah, it was great♪ The once per year luxury of 
<story>basking in the sun, taking a nap during the first 
<story>sunrise……together with some of Cesario's cocoa!

data.text:
That's part of the set? That makes me happy though…… 
Fufufuu. Kraft, you really love sunbathing, huh?
data.name: Cesario
data.processed:
<story>That's part of the set? That makes me happy though…… 
<story>Fufufuu. Kraft, you really love sunbathing, huh?

data.text:
Ah, but……it's probably time to get changed, and start getting 
ready. Otherwise you might be late for our shrine visit.
data.name: Cesario
data.processed:
<story>Ah, but……it's probably time to get changed, and start getting 
<story>ready. Otherwise you might be late for our shrine visit.

data.text:
Wah, you're right! I'm going to head back to my room! 
Cesario, wait for me by the front gate~!!
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>Wah, you're right! I'm going to head back to my room! 
<story>Cesario, wait for me by the front gate~!!

data.text:
A New Year. Rhein Kraft and Cesario were now in 
their Classic year, and we had decided to go as a 
group for the first shrine visit of the new year, but――
data.processed:
<story>A New Year. Rhein Kraft and Cesario were now in 
<story>their Classic year, and we had decided to go as a 
<story>group for the first shrine visit of the new year, but――

data.text:
Ah, geez, everyone, are you keeping up!? 
Respond if you can hear me-!
data.name: King Halo
data.processed:
<story>Ah, geez, everyone, are you keeping up!? 
<story>Respond if you can hear me-!

data.text: Hii, hii……For now, I am~.
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed: <story>Hii, hii……For now, I am~.

data.text:
It's crazy how crowded it is~……we were packed 
in there so tight, that I thought all that 
osechi I ate earlier was going to come out~……
data.name: Antenna-haired Uma Musume
data.processed:
<story>It's crazy how crowded it is~……we were packed 
<story>in there so tight, that I thought all that 
<story>osechi I ate earlier was going to come out~……

data.text:
I have a suggestion. From what I've observed, the 
congestion has eased a bit on the right side. The 
lines have yet to form so I think we should move now.
data.name: Cesario
data.processed:
<story>I have a suggestion. From what I've observed, the 
<story>congestion has eased a bit on the right side. The 
<story>lines have yet to form so I think we should move now.

data.text:
Also, let's decide on a meeting place to gather 
up in after the visit. It would probably be easiest 
to find each other over by the sacred tree.
data.name: Cesario
data.processed:
<story>Also, let's decide on a meeting place to gather 
<story>up in after the visit. It would probably be easiest 
<story>to find each other over by the sacred tree.

data.text:
That's true……! Oh man~, when Cesario's switch is on, 
she's really got it together and is really reliable.
data.name: Single Knot Uma Musume
data.processed:
<story>That's true……! Oh man~, when Cesario's switch is on, 
<story>she's really got it together and is really reliable.

data.text:
And so, despite the huge crowd, we were somehow 
able to safely wrap up our shrine visit.
data.processed:
<story>And so, despite the huge crowd, we were somehow 
<story>able to safely wrap up our shrine visit.

data.text:
(……this year, I'll give it my all to support the team. Please 
watch over them, and may they get the results they desire――)
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>(……this year, I'll give it my all to support the team. Please 
<story>watch over them, and may they get the results they desire――)

data.text:
Hey, you're taking too long. The line is 
piling up behind us. Geez……come on, let's go.
data.name: King Halo
data.processed:
<story>Hey, you're taking too long. The line is 
<story>piling up behind us. Geez……come on, let's go.

data.text:
(And now that we'd wrapped up our shrine visit, and since it 
was the new year, I felt we should take it easy, however――)
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>(And now that we'd wrapped up our shrine visit, and since it 
<story>was the new year, I felt we should take it easy, however――)

data.text:
Ehehe……thanks for tagging along with our independent 
training! When I think about how this is the start 
of my classic year, I can't help but get restless.
data.name: Rhein Kraft

choices.text: I'm glad you're both so motivated
I'm glad you're both so motivated

data.processed:
<story>Ehehe……thanks for tagging along with our independent 
<story>training! When I think about how this is the start 
<story>of my classic year, I can't help but get restless.

data.text:
I'm also thankful to our senpais. This year, I look 
forward to your continued guidance and support.
data.name: Cesario
data.processed:
<story>I'm also thankful to our senpais. This year, I look 
<story>forward to your continued guidance and support.

data.text:
Ah, no prob……or rather, hearing our kouhais say they want 
to run makes it really hard to say "We're heading back~"……
data.name: Antenna-haired Uma Musume
data.processed:
<story>Ah, no prob……or rather, hearing our kouhais say they want 
<story>to run makes it really hard to say "We're heading back~"……

data.text:
Are you an idiot! You should have just said that it was motivating 
you, even if it was a lie! ……Ah, but, it's not a lie though!!
data.name: Single Knot Uma Musume
data.processed:
<story>Are you an idiot! You should have just said that it was motivating 
<story>you, even if it was a lie! ……Ah, but, it's not a lie though!!

data.text:
Well, in any case, I think it's a good idea. 
There are so many once-in-a-lifetime races…… 
it makes the Classic year a very special year.
data.name: King Halo
data.processed:
<story>Well, in any case, I think it's a good idea. 
<story>There are so many once-in-a-lifetime races…… 
<story>it makes the Classic year a very special year.

data.text:
……speaking of that, have you two thought 
of which races you're going to aim for?
data.name: King Halo
data.processed:
<story>……speaking of that, have you two thought 
<story>of which races you're going to aim for?

data.text: The 『Oka Sho』.
data.name: Kraft & Cesario
data.processed: <story>The 『Oka Sho』.

data.text:
……that's right. Cesario and I have…… 
already decided on the Triple Tiara route.
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>……that's right. Cesario and I have…… 
<story>already decided on the Triple Tiara route.

data.text:
Right. It was decided from the start. 『Oka Sho』 『Oaks』 
『Shuuka Sho』 is the route I've decided to run.
data.name: Cesario
data.processed:
<story>Right. It was decided from the start. 『Oka Sho』 『Oaks』 
<story>『Shuuka Sho』 is the route I've decided to run.

data.text:
The Uma Musume that have taken on the Triple 
Tiara rotation aren't just strong――they've filled 
the racing world with grace and beauty.
data.name: Cesario
data.processed:
<story>The Uma Musume that have taken on the Triple 
<story>Tiara rotation aren't just strong――they've filled 
<story>the racing world with grace and beauty.

data.text:
All the way up until now, many spectators and 
even Uma Musume have been fascinated by their 
efforts. Many run now, dreaming of wearing that tiara.
data.name: Cesario
data.processed:
<story>All the way up until now, many spectators and 
<story>even Uma Musume have been fascinated by their 
<story>efforts. Many run now, dreaming of wearing that tiara.

data.text:
Me too――I want to become an Uma Musume that 
continues on as part of that history.
data.name: Cesario
data.processed:
<story>Me too――I want to become an Uma Musume that 
<story>continues on as part of that history.

data.text:
……In addition to that, many Uma Musume that have achieved 
results in the Triple Tiara rotation have gone on to train 
the next generation, linking everything to the future.
data.name: Cesario
data.processed:
<story>……In addition to that, many Uma Musume that have achieved 
<story>results in the Triple Tiara rotation have gone on to train 
<story>the next generation, linking everything to the future.

data.text:
It's still a far off dream, however…… 
someday, I'd like to be a part of that too.
data.name: Cesario
data.processed:
<story>It's still a far off dream, however…… 
<story>someday, I'd like to be a part of that too.

data.text:
To me, obtaining results in the Triple Tiara 
rotation was part of my dream since the beginning.
data.name: Cesario
data.processed:
<story>To me, obtaining results in the Triple Tiara 
<story>rotation was part of my dream since the beginning.

data.text:
(What Cesario was speaking about was part of the history, 
tradition, and appeal of the Triple Tiara route)
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>(What Cesario was speaking about was part of the history, 
<story>tradition, and appeal of the Triple Tiara route)

data.text:
(There was nothing wrong with that――however. 
There was still one thing I'd have to remind them of……)
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>(There was nothing wrong with that――however. 
<story>There was still one thing I'd have to remind them of……)

data.text:
Generally speaking, the Classic Triple Crown, 
the 『Satsuki Sho』 『Japan Derby』 and 『Kikka Sho』 
――honestly, they draw much more attention.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Generally speaking, the Classic Triple Crown, 
<story>the 『Satsuki Sho』 『Japan Derby』 and 『Kikka Sho』 
<story>――honestly, they draw much more attention.

data.text:
Typically, when it comes to Triple Crown versus Triple 
Tiara Uma Musume, the former have achieved better results.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Typically, when it comes to Triple Crown versus Triple 
<story>Tiara Uma Musume, the former have achieved better results.

data.text:
To put it plainly, 『Triple Crown girls are stronger 
than Triple Tiara girls』……That's the general consensus.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>To put it plainly, 『Triple Crown girls are stronger 
<story>than Triple Tiara girls』……That's the general consensus.

data.text:
To put it plainly, 『Triple Crown girls are stronger 
than Triple Tiara girls』……That's the general consensus.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>To put it plainly, 『Triple Crown girls are stronger 
<story>than Triple Tiara girls』……That's the general consensus.

data.text: ……Even knowing that, do you still feel the same way?
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>……Even knowing that, do you still feel the same way?

data.text: ……Even knowing that, do you still feel the same way?
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>……Even knowing that, do you still feel the same way?

data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed: <story>……Um!!

data.text: But that's just――how it is 『now』 right?
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed: <story>But that's just――how it is 『now』 right?

data.text:
Someday……no, soon, I think that will change. 
Between Triple Crown and Triple Tiara it doesn't 
matter……『Strong Uma Musume are strong』!
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>Someday……no, soon, I think that will change. 
<story>Between Triple Crown and Triple Tiara it doesn't 
<story>matter……『Strong Uma Musume are strong』!

data.text:
I know an Uma Musume who's said that. I believe 
that too. Because I've looked up to that Tiara, 
and I've been watching this whole time――!
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>I know an Uma Musume who's said that. I believe 
<story>that too. Because I've looked up to that Tiara, 
<story>and I've been watching this whole time――!

data.text:
I know about the passion, the emotion, and the strength of 
those Uma Musume! I know they're not worse than the others!!
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>I know about the passion, the emotion, and the strength of 
<story>those Uma Musume! I know they're not worse than the others!!

data.text:
And that's why I'm choosing the Triple Tiara 
rotation. And, I'll become strong enough that 
I won't lose against Triple Crown Uma Musume!
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>And that's why I'm choosing the Triple Tiara 
<story>rotation. And, I'll become strong enough that 
<story>I won't lose against Triple Crown Uma Musume!

data.text:
What kept me going……what gave me all of my 
inspiration, was those Triple Tiara senpais. 
So I want to prove their merit, their strength!
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>What kept me going……what gave me all of my 
<story>inspiration, was those Triple Tiara senpais. 
<story>So I want to prove their merit, their strength!

data.text:
Sorry for saying something so insensitive. I understand 
both of your feelings. In your Classic year, the first 
major goal for both of you is to win the 『Oka Sho』!
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Sorry for saying something so insensitive. I understand 
<story>both of your feelings. In your Classic year, the first 
<story>major goal for both of you is to win the 『Oka Sho』!

data.text: Yes!!
data.name: Kraft & Cesario
data.processed: <story>Yes!!

data.text:
……Huuu. And so another two――huh. 
Thinking about it, it's still a mystery.
data.name: Air Groove
data.processed:
<story>……Huuu. And so another two――huh. 
<story>Thinking about it, it's still a mystery.

data.text:
More attention is on the Triple Crown. 
And the race called the 『Greatest Dream』, the 『Japan Derby』.
data.name: Air Groove
data.processed:
<story>More attention is on the Triple Crown. 
<story>And the race called the 『Greatest Dream』, the 『Japan Derby』.

data.text:
Despite that, every year, without fail, more girls 
like that always appear. Girls that desire the Tiara 
more than the Triple Crown or the glory of the Derby.
data.name: Air Groove
data.processed:
<story>Despite that, every year, without fail, more girls 
<story>like that always appear. Girls that desire the Tiara 
<story>more than the Triple Crown or the glory of the Derby.

data.text:
However, there are some things……that can 
only be obtained, only brought together in 
that place, on that stage. Where the Tiara is.
data.name: Air Groove
data.processed:
<story>However, there are some things……that can 
<story>only be obtained, only brought together in 
<story>that place, on that stage. Where the Tiara is.

data.text:
That's why, this year, once again――the curtain will 
rise on the brilliant and fierce stage of the Tiara.
data.name: Air Groove
data.processed:
<story>That's why, this year, once again――the curtain will 
<story>rise on the brilliant and fierce stage of the Tiara.

data.text:
Well then……Rhein Kraft, and Cesario. 
What will you carve in to that beautiful theater--?
data.name: Air Groove
data.processed:
<story>Well then……Rhein Kraft, and Cesario. 
<story>What will you carve in to that beautiful theater--?
